GPUCommandBuffer.summary: The GPUCommandBuffer interface of the {{domxref("WebGPU API", "WebGPU API", "", "nocode")}} represents a pre-recorded list of GPU commands that can be submitted to a for execution.

remarks.para: A GPUCommandBuffer is created via the method; the GPU commands recorded within are submitted for execution by passing the GPUCommandBuffer into the parameter of a call.

blockquote.para: Once a GPUCommandBuffer object has been submitted, it cannot be used again.
